job_description:
Product Manager - Ruby Seven Studios

Ruby Seven Studios is seeking a dynamic and results-oriented Product Manager to join their inspiring game development team. This role focuses on producing games for the highly competitive social casino game genre.

What you will be doing:

  • Own the game product from conception to launch.
  • Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams including Marketing, Sales, Production, Technical, and Art.
  • Assist in sprint planning and game publishing processes.
  • Regularly communicate product updates to senior leadership and convey feedback to the production team.

Desired Skill Set:

  • Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to effectively liaunt with international partners.
  • Data Analysis: Ability to understand and interpret data provided by the Analytics team, as our games are data-driven.
  • Team Management: Strong team management skills with hands-on experience working with cross-functional teams (design, engineering, data analytics, marketing).
  • Organizational Skills: Proactive, highly organized with excellent time management capabilities to ensure teams meet set timelines.
  • Process Mindset: A process-oriented mindset is essential.
  • Gaming Interest: An interest in gaming and the ability to understand various game features is highly appreciated.
  • Learning Agility: Possess intellectual curiosity and a keenness to learn new things.
  • Product Strategy: Proven ability to define and drive product roadmaps, prioritizing features based on data, impact, and player feedback.
  • Game Expertise: Strong understanding of F2P game economy design, liveops, engagement loops, and monetization strategies.
  • KPI Fluency: Familiarity with game KPIs (DAU, ARPDAU, Retention, LTV, etc.) and the ability to derive actionable insights.
  • Documentation: Ability to write clear Product Requirements Documents (PRDs), create user flows, and manage backlogs.
  • Player Understanding: Understanding of player psychology, segmentation, and data-driven personalization.

Work Experience:

  • 2-4 years of experience, preferably in a startup environment in a similar role.

How to Apply:

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careersindia@rubyseven.com
summary: Seeking a Product Manager for social casino games. Role involves end-to-end ownership, cross-functional collaboration, and data-driven strategy. Requires 2-4 years experience.

job_description:
Creative Designer - Graphics and Motion

We are seeking a talented Creative Designer specializing in Graphics and Motion to join our dynamic creative team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for crafting compelling visual content, animations, and motion graphics for a diverse range of digital platforms. This includes social media, marketing campaigns, advertisements, and brand storytelling initiatives.

This role demands a keen eye for design aesthetics, exceptional creativity, and a high level of proficiency in industry-standard design and animation software.

Responsibilities:

  • Graphic Design:
    • Create visually appealing designs for social media, websites, branding, and marketing materials.
    • Design brochures, banners, posters, and presentations.
    • Develop core branding elements, including logos, typography, and color palettes.
  • Motion Graphics & Animation:
    • Produce engaging 2D motion graphics, explainer videos, and animated advertisements.
    • Design and animate title sequences, lower-thirds, transitions, and infographics.
    • Perform video editing and post-production to enhance visual appeal.
  • Collaboration & Project Management:
    • Collaborate closely with marketing, content, and video production teams to realize creative concepts.
    • Brainstorm and execute creative ideas that align with brand identity.
    • Ensure timely project delivery while upholding the highest quality standards.
  • Trends & Innovation:
    • Stay current with the latest design trends, animation techniques, and industry tools.
    • Experiment with new styles and creative approaches to boost content engagement.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

  • Proficiency in Design & Animation Software: Expert knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Premiere Pro, Audition).
  • 3D Software (Plus): Familiarity with Cinema 4D, Blender, or other 3D software is advantageous.
  • Strong Design & Animation Skills: Excellent grasp of typography, color theory, and composition principles. Ability to create fluid and dynamic motion graphics. Experience in storyboarding and visual storytelling.
  • Creativity & Problem-Solving: Demonstrated ability to translate abstract ideas into engaging visuals and animations. Meticulous attention to detail and a genuine passion for creative design.
  • Team Player & Communication: Capacity to receive and integrate feedback effectively. Strong collaborative skills for working with diverse teams. Excellent organizational skills and the ability to consistently meet deadlines.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design, Motion Graphics, Multimedia Arts, or a related field.
  • 3-6 years of professional experience in graphic design and motion graphics.

How to Apply:

If you are a creative professional with a robust portfolio showcasing your graphic design and motion graphics expertise, we encourage you to apply! Please submit your updated CV and portfolio/reel to talenthunt@globalsurf.ae with the subject line: "Application for Creative Designer – Global Surf".

Should this opportunity resonate with your career aspirations, please forward your updated resume to talenthunt@globalsurf.ae.

job_description:
Software Test Engineers / Software Testers

Company: KOTT Software

About KOTT Software: KOTT Software is a globally recognized, ISO 9001:2015-certified company with a strong legacy in enterprise product development and offshore software services since 1997. With a dedicated international clientele, we specialize in delivering robust, client-focused business solutions across diverse industries. We partner with global organizations to enable and accelerate their digital transformation journey, leveraging deep domain expertise and enterprise application capabilities.

Opportunity: Join us for the opportunity to work on niche US-based domains and industry verticals, collaborate closely with Fortune 100 clients, and contribute in an agile development environment involving technical reviews, quality assurance, and collaborative delivery.

Role Overview: At least 1+ years of Software Testing experience in a Web application development environment. The job requires interacting with the software application development team, clients & involvement in test design, developing test cases, test plans & execution of Enterprise Solutions.

Job Responsibilities:

  • Software manual Testing and related activities in a web-based application environment.
  • Work closely in an Agile development team environment and meet release plan schedules and patch management.
  • Developing and implementing test plans, test strategy, test cases, and test reports for various testing, like, regression, functional & performance testing.
  • Recording and tracking defects through a Web-based project management tool.
  • Setting up and following procedures for bug/issues/defects.
  • Responsible for testing all software products/projects.
  • May need to work in flexible time to attend US/Europe client meetings.

Technical / Functional (Must Have Skills):

  • Prior experience in Testing Web-based applications / Enterprise level applications and solutions is a plus.
  • Experience in Manual Testing. Writing Test cases.
  • Sound knowledge of STLC, software testing methodologies and procedures.
  • Identifying Test scenarios, creating test plans, test strategy, test cases, and execution.
  • Sound understanding and developing/executing test cases in an application development environment.
  • Knowledge of Quality Assurance/testing life cycle Process is a plus.
  • Minimum 1+ years of experience in developing AND executing test cases in a client-driven environment.
  • Experience in using any bug-tracking tool.

Preferred Skills:

  • Sound knowledge of software testing methodologies and procedures.
  • Hands-on skills in Selenium / JMeter / UFT automation tools in a live environment is a plus.
  • Ability to write scripts in Java or VB Script is an advantage.
  • Basic SQL concepts and query writing.
  • Good communication & interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to think ‘OUT OF THE BOX’.

Qualification:

B.E./B.Tech./M.C.A./BCA/BSc. with Diploma in software testing or quality assurance.

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at manualtest@kottsoftware.com

job_description:
Pathologist (Oncology-Focused, AI & Digital Pathology)

Location: Hybrid and Remote (Kochi Office visits as needed)

Reports to: Head of Medical Affairs & Chief Clinical Officer

Department: Clinical & Medical Affairs – Pathology

About ThinkBio.ai

ThinkBio.ai is a fast-growing health-tech company at the intersection of AI, precision medicine, and clinical innovation, with a vision to transform care delivery in oncology and beyond. We integrate advanced computational models with deep clinical expertise to build solutions for early detection, diagnosis, treatment personalization, and digital pathology workflows.

We are seeking a motivated Pathologist with strong foundations in pathology (oncology focus preferred) and a passion for AI, digital pathology, and translational innovation.

Role Overview

The Pathologist will serve as a key clinical expert for ThinkBio.ai’s pathology initiatives. The role combines oncopathology expertise with broader pathology knowledge, content validation, and knowledge creation to support AI-powered solutions. This position requires both academic rigor and innovation, working closely with clinicians, scientists, and engineers.

Key Responsibilities

Pathology & Oncology Expertise

  • Provide domain expertise in oncopathology (priority) while supporting other pathology areas as required.
  • Stay updated on latest advances in pathology (diagnostics, biomarkers, classifications, molecular assays).
  • Ensure accuracy and clinical reliability in pathology-focused content validation.

AI, Digital & Telepathology

  • Collaborate on projects in digital pathology, telepathology, and AI-driven workflows.
  • Validate AI model outputs related to histopathology, tumor grading, classification, and biomarker detection.

Content & Knowledge Development

  • Validate medical content (MBBS-level and above) for accuracy and clinical alignment.
  • Create pathology notes, structured resources, and knowledge graphs for disease segments in focus.
  • Reference standard pathology textbooks and guidelines in all deliverables.

Reporting & Collaboration

  • Provide weekly summary reports of activities and contributions.
  • Work as part of a multidisciplinary team with clinicians, researchers, and data scientists.
  • Deliver 1–2 online presentations per month to clinical and non-clinical teams.
  • Share innovative ideas and inputs to guide research and product development.

Qualifications & Requirements

  • MD in Pathology (mandatory).
  • 1 year of job experience preferable (oncology-related experience strongly valued).
  • Strong understanding of oncopathology, tumor biology, and biomarkers, plus general pathology knowledge.
  • Familiarity with digital pathology, telepathology, and AI applications in pathology.
  • Demonstrated ability to validate pathology-specific content accurately.
  • Excellent communication skills, with ability to present to both clinicians and non-clinicians.
  • Good work ethics, flexibility in working hours, and willingness to travel frequently to the Kochi office.
  • Passion for AI advancements in pathology and a collaborative, innovative mindset.

Preferred Attributes

  • Prior experience in oncology diagnostics or exposure to multi-specialty pathology.
  • Strong academic referencing and ability to translate complex pathology into structured knowledge.
  • Team-oriented with a problem-solving and innovative outlook.

Why Join Us?

  • Contribute to shaping the future of AI in pathology and oncology care.
  • Collaborate with a diverse team of clinicians, pathologists, data scientists, and AI engineers.
  • Hybrid flexibility, dynamic work culture, and opportunities to lead knowledge-driven innovation.
  • Play a critical role in bridging clinical pathology expertise with digital transformation.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@feathersoft.com
summary: Pathologist sought for AI and digital pathology initiatives. Responsibilities include oncopathology expertise, content validation, and collaboration with AI teams. Must have MD in Pathology.

job_description:

We are committed to a flexible, modern work culture and work-life balance. Our colour orange stands for liveliness, warmth, and dynamism. We value a strong team spirit, fresh ideas, and a positive work culture. We call it the “Orange Spirit”!

Since 2024, in-tech became a subsidiary of Infosys Ltd. This strategic partnership enables us to offer our customers even more comprehensive development and digitalisation services and a greater offshore capability.

We are looking for experienced IT Support Engineers to join our team based out of our Kochi location with hybrid work options. If you’re passionate about joining a growing and dynamic team with a company with a positive culture and team spirit, we’d love to connect with you!

Responsibilities:

  1. Support and maintain basic networking infrastructure, including Layer 2 switching, Layer 2 separation, and Layer 3 routing.
  2. Assist with configuration and management of firewall rules and security settings to ensure secure network operations.
  3. Perform first-level network troubleshooting and issue resolution and configure and maintain basic network hardware setups.
  4. Support compliance efforts through a basic understanding of ISO 27001 and TISAX frameworks.
  5. Manage and administer Microsoft Intune for software deployment, policy management, reporting, and device enrolment (Microsoft Autopilot, Apple DEP, Google ZeroTouch).
  6. Administer Microsoft Cloud services, including Entra ID, Conditional Access policies, Risky User management, Enterprise Applications, SAML configurations, and Entra Connect.
  7. Utilize Microsoft Security Portal for threat management and compliance monitoring.
  8. Administer and support Exchange Online environments and manage and configure Microsoft Teams settings and permissions.
  9. Administer Windows Active Directory, including user and group management.
  10. Develop and maintain automation scripts using PowerShell to streamline administrative tasks.
  11. Provide support and configuration expertise for Microsoft Windows 10 and 11 operating systems.

Requirements:

The ideal candidate would be a graduate with a minimum of 5+ years of proven work experience as an IT Administrator or in a similar role. In addition to this, you will need to meet the following requirements:

  1. Hands-on experience with Microsoft Intune for software deployment, policy configuration, reporting, and device enrollment (e.g., Microsoft AutoPilot, Apple DEP, Google ZeroTouch) and supporting Microsoft Windows 10/11 operating systems.
  2. Strong knowledge of Microsoft Cloud services, particularly Entra ID, Conditional Access, Risky Users, Enterprise Applications, SAML, and Entra Connect.
  3. Experience managing Microsoft Exchange Online and Microsoft Teams, including administration and configuration tasks.
  4. Solid experience with PowerShell scripting for automation and streamlining IT processes.
  5. Solid experience with Atlassian Cloud (Jira, Confluence), including automation, service desk configuration, and migrations from Data Centre to Cloud.
  6. Scripting experience with Script Runner for Jira/Confluence and strong documentation skills.

Apply with us:

If you have experience and team spirit and are looking for a great place to work, then start your job with us.

job_description:
SQL Database Administrator

As an SQL Database Administrator, you will be responsible for the setup, performance, integrity, and security of SQL Server databases. Your role will also include planning and development, as well as troubleshooting issues on behalf of the users.

Key Responsibilities:

  1. Installation, Configuration, and Maintenance
    • Install, configure, and upgrade SQL Server instances.
    • Set up advanced features like Always On Availability Groups and failover clustering.
  2. Performance Tuning and Optimization
    • Monitor database performance and identify bottlenecks.
    • Optimize queries, manage indexes, and adjust server configurations for optimal performance.
  3. Backup and Recovery
    • Design and implement robust backup and recovery strategies.
    • Conduct regular testing to ensure data integrity and minimize downtime during failures.
  4. High Availability and Disaster Recovery (HA/DR)
    • Implement and manage HA/DR solutions such as Always On, clustering, and log shipping.
    • Ensure business continuity through disaster recovery planning.
  5. Security and Compliance
    • Manage user access, roles, and permissions.
    • Enforce security policies and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.
  6. Troubleshooting and Support
    • Diagnose and resolve database-related issues.
    • Provide 24x7 support for critical production systems.
    • Collaborate with developers to support database-related operations.
  7. Automation and Documentation
    • Develop scripts and tools to automate routine administrative tasks.
    • Maintain clear and up-to-date documentation of configurations, processes, and procedures.

Additional Information:

  • Advantageous Certifications: Candidates who have passed any of the following Microsoft database-related certifications will have an added advantage:
    • Microsoft Certified: Azure Database Administrator Associate (Exam Code: DP-300 Administering Relational Databases on Microsoft Azure).
    • MCSA: SQL 2016 Database Administration (Exam Code: 70-764 Administering a SQL Database Infrastructure).
    • MCSA: SQL 2016 Database Development or BI Development.
  • Qualification: Any Graduate / Any Post Graduate.
  • Experience: 3-4 years.
  • Location: Kochi, Navi Mumbai, Thrissur.

Contact Information:

Interested candidates may share their CVs at hr@jupiterbs.com. Contact us at 6282902505 & 9778417280 for any queries. If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hr@jupiterbs.com.

job_description:
Senior Engineer (Real Money Gaming)

We are seeking a Senior Engineer to join our Real Money Gaming (RMG) platform team, with a specific focus on RGS (Remote Game Server) game development. The role involves building high-performance, secure, and scalable backend systems responsible for managing game sessions, secure wallet transactions, game state, and real-time events. Your contributions will directly support real-money casino games, ensuring compliance, responsible gaming practices, and delivering seamless player experiences across both web and mobile platforms.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, implement, and maintain backend systems and APIs for RMG platforms and RGS games using Node.js and TypeScript.
  • Integrate RGS games with the platform, covering session management, game state persistence, RNG (Random Number Generator) validation, bonus events, and win/loss processing.
  • Design and implement secure wallet systems, including integration with third-party wallet systems, ensuring transaction integrity, atomicity, and auditability for deposits, bets, wins, and withdrawals.
  • Implement features for fraud detection, anti-cheat, and responsible gaming.
  • Build real-time communication channels between RGS, platform, and frontend clients (e.g., WebSocket, Pub/Sub).
  • Optimize backend systems for high concurrency, low latency, and fault tolerance.
  • Collaborate on CI/CD pipelines, cloud deployments, and microservices architecture.
  • Monitor, debug, and continuously improve system performance and reliability.
  • Mentor junior engineers and provide guidance on RMG/RGS backend best practices.

Required Qualifications:

  • 6+ years of backend development experience, preferably in RMG, online casinos, or sports betting platforms.
  • Strong expertise in Node.js and frameworks such as Express or NestJS.
  • Proficiency in TypeScript/JavaScript for backend development.
  • Hands-on experience with databases (SQL & NoSQL), caching layers (Redis/Memcached), and message brokers (Kafka/RabbitMQ).
  • Solid understanding of real-time systems (WebSockets, Pub/Sub, message queues) and high-concurrency architectures.
  • Deep knowledge of authentication, authorization, encryption, and security best practices (JWT, OAuth, HTTPS, secure key storage).
  • Experience with payment gateways, wallets, and transaction security.
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure), containerization (Docker/Kubernetes), and CI/CD pipelines.
  • Strong debugging, profiling, and performance optimization skills.
  • Experience with RGS game server architecture and terminology, including game sessions, spin results, RNG validation, bonus/feature events, jackpot integration, and state persistence.

Preferred Skills:

  • Knowledge of RMG regulatory compliance (KYC, responsible gaming, anti-fraud).
  • Familiarity with integrating backend APIs with frontend platforms.
  • Experience with monitoring and observability tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK).
  • Understanding of microservices architecture for casino platforms.

How to Apply:

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, please send your updated resume to careersindia@rubyseven.com.

  2. Business Process Mapping

  4. User Training & Support

job_description:
Solution Validation Analyst

Company: Klystron Technologies Office: Nbr: 2210, Yamuna Building, Technopark Phase-III, 695583 Contact Email: jobs.in@klystronglobal.com Closing Date: 27, Oct 2025 Job Published: 16, Oct 2025

About Us

Klystron Global is a leading provider of cutting-edge Digital Transformation solutions tailored to meet the evolving needs of businesses across various industries. With a focus on innovation and client satisfaction, we are committed to delivering exceptional technology solutions that empower organizations to thrive in the digital era.

Position Overview

We are seeking a proactive and results-driven Solution Validation Analyst to serve as the critical bridge between business needs and technical quality. The ideal candidate will be responsible for defining, analyzing, and validating robust technology solutions, ensuring they not only meet client specifications but also deliver maximum operational effectiveness.

This role requires leveraging strong analytical skills and industry knowledge (preferably in the banking and financial markets) to capture requirements, design the optimal solution, and execute comprehensive testing—including test automation—to ensure flawless delivery and successful digital transformation.

Job Responsibilities

Solution Strategy & Business Analysis (Define the Solution) - Lead the requirements gathering process by working with clients to understand, document, and analyse business needs, ensuring alignment with project goals and objectives. - Evaluate and recommend process improvements for client systems (e.g., banking and financial systems) to enhance efficiency and meet regulatory compliance. - Collaborate with the development team to design and implement technology solutions that meet client specifications. - Prepare comprehensive business requirement documents (BRD), functional specifications, user stories, and process flow diagrams. - Serve as the strategic liaison between clients, project teams, and other stakeholders, ensuring clear communication and managing expectations. - Stay updated on trends and regulatory changes in the banking and financial services industry to proactively identify impacts on client projects.

Validation & Quality Assurance (Verify the Solution) - Design and execute comprehensive test planning and test case design, including defining tests for functionalities and performance. - Develop and maintain robust test automation frameworks and perform hands-on automation for frontend, API, and/or database systems. - Utilize automation tools such as Selenium, Appium, Cypress, Serenity BDD, REST API testing, and Cucumber. - Perform various specialized tests, including performance tests (e.g., using Jmeter), usability, and/or security tests. - Design the overall test strategy for a project. - Assist in creating test plans, perform User Acceptance Testing (UAT), and ensure the final product meets established requirements. - Use defect tracking/management tools such as JIRA and work with version control systems (TFS, git).

Key Skills and Experience

Experience: 3-4 years of experience combining the functions of Business Analyst and Test/QA Engineer, preferably in the banking and financial markets. Education: Engineering Degree in any Discipline, Master in Computer Science, or a Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology/related field.

QA & Technical: - Hands-on experience in test automation. - Intermediate programming experience in one or more of: Java, C#, JavaScript/TypeScript, Python. - Experience in a continuous integration environment (Jenkins/TeamCity, Maven).

Analysis & Methodology: - Strong knowledge of financial and banking operations, systems, and regulatory requirements. - Proficiency in requirements gathering, process mapping, and documentation techniques. - Familiarity with Agile and Iterative SDLCs and project management methodologies (e.g., Agile, Waterfall).

Preferred Qualifications

  • Basic knowledge of SQL and/or data query languages.
  • Experience with data analysis tools and Business Intelligence (BI) software.
  • Experience with mobile testing, cloud migration testing, or data integrity testing.
  • Certifications such as CBAP or ACP are an advantage.
  • Experience with fintech or regulatory compliance projects is beneficial.

Benefits

  • Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
  • Ongoing professional development opportunities.
  • A collaborative and innovative work environment.

Application

If you are a motivated and experienced Solution Validation Analyst, we invite you to apply with your updated resume through jobs.in@klystronglobal.com with the subject line "Solution Validation Analyst". Please ensure the following details are included in your email: - Current CTC - Expected CTC - Notice Period
summary: Seeking a Solution Validation Analyst for digital transformation projects. Responsibilities include business analysis, test automation, and quality assurance in the banking sector.

job_title: Senior Associate – US Accounting and Compliance
job_description:
Senior Associate – US Accounting and Compliance

Company: BEYONGEN ACUMEN (P) Ltd Location: Technopark, Trivandrum (Kerala) - On-site preferred; hybrid for experienced candidates. Contact Email: careers@thebga.io Closing Date: October 31, 2025 Job Published: October 15, 2025

Company Overview:

Beyongen Acumen is a growing Indian firm based in Technopark, Trivandrum, specializing in providing accounting, tax compliance, and payroll support to U.S.-based clients. Our focus is on delivering accurate, timely, and compliant financial services that meet the highest U.S. standards. We work with clients across multiple states in the U.S., supporting them with Federal and State corporate filings, tax computations, payroll processing, and regulatory compliance — serving as their trusted offshore finance team.

Position Overview:

We are seeking an experienced Senior Associate – US Accounting and Compliance to manage end-to-end accounting, tax, and payroll functions for U.S. entities. This role demands strong technical knowledge of U.S. corporate tax filings, foreign-owned entity reporting (Form 5472), multi-state compliance (Form 335, RCT-101), and payroll tax processing (Forms 941, 940, W-2, 1099-NEC). The candidate will collaborate closely with U.S.-based CPA firms and clients, ensuring complete compliance and accurate financial reporting.

Key Responsibilities:

Accounting & Reporting:

  • Manage full-cycle accounting for U.S. entities, including journal entries, reconciliations, and monthly closing.
  • Prepare financial statements and trial balances under U.S. GAAP.
  • Maintain and reconcile A/P, A/R, and general ledger accounts.

Tax Compliance:

  • Prepare and review Federal Corporate Tax Returns (Form 1120) and Partnership Returns (Form 1065).
  • Ensure compliance for foreign-owned U.S. entities through Form 5472 reporting.
  • Manage State filings, including:
  • Form 335 (State-level compliance returns)
  • RCT-101 (Pennsylvania Corporate Tax Return)
  • Other state-specific franchise and annual report filings.
  • Prepare Form 7004 for extensions and Form 1120-W for quarterly estimated tax calculations.
  • Assist with sales tax filings and multi-state nexus compliance.

Payroll Processing & Compliance:

  • Process payroll using Gusto, ADP, or QuickBooks Payroll.
  • Compute gross-to-net pay, including federal, state, and local deductions.
  • File all relevant payroll tax forms, such as:
  • Form 941 – Quarterly Federal Tax Return
  • Form 940 – Annual FUTA Return
  • Form W-2/W-3 – Annual wage reporting
  • Form 1099-NEC/MISC – Contractor payments
  • State withholding and unemployment filings (SUTA/SUI)
  • Reconcile payroll liabilities and ensure on-time remittances.

Compliance & Coordination:

  • Maintain a compliance calendar for all Federal and State deadlines.
  • Liaise with U.S. CPAs and tax agents for reviews, filings, and audits.
  • Handle client correspondence related to IRS or State tax notices.
  • Ensure complete data confidentiality and secure record management.

Preferred Skills:

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or Commerce.
  • 3–6 years of hands-on experience in U.S. accounting, tax, and payroll.
  • Strong knowledge of:
  • Forms 1120, 1065, 5472, 7004, 941, 940, W-2, 1099, 335, RCT-101
  • U.S. GAAP and Federal/State tax regulations.
  • Proficiency in QuickBooks, Xero, Sage, or Intuit ProConnect.
  • Excellent English communication and coordination skills.
  • High attention to detail and strong analytical mindset.
  • Experience in working with U.S. CPA firms preferred.

Contact: careers@thebga.io
summary: Manage US accounting, tax, and payroll for US entities. Requires expertise in US GAAP, corporate tax filings, and payroll processing.

The ideal candidate embraces AI-assisted development (GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT, AutoGen, etc.) to boost productivity, improve code quality, and drive innovation across our application stack. This role combines backend expertise, cloud-native architecture, and hands-on AI integration to deliver intelligent, high-performance solutions.

Key Responsibilities:

AI Model Integration & Optimization - Integrate APIs from multiple AI platforms (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Llama, Mistral, etc.) into scalable backend systems. - Build multi-model orchestration layers balancing cost, latency, and accuracy. - Fine-tune prompts, manage context windows, and implement RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) solutions for domain-specific use cases. - Optimize token usage, caching, and filtering strategies to enhance system efficiency and user experience.

Application & System Development - Design and implement AI-enabled workflows seamlessly integrated with web, mobile, or enterprise ecosystems. - Develop Python-based backends and APIs using frameworks like FastAPI, Flask, or Django. - Build and deploy microservices and cloud-native services leveraging Docker, Kubernetes, and serverless architectures. - Collaborate with frontend, DevOps, and product teams to ensure smooth feature delivery and deployment. - Monitor and evaluate AI responses through metrics, evaluation frameworks, or RLHF-inspired feedback loops. - Implement AI guardrails for responsible usage including bias detection, toxicity filtering, and compliance enforcement. - Debug and resolve performance or reliability issues in AI-powered production systems.

Innovation & Collaboration - Stay up to date with the evolving AI model landscape, exploring new models, APIs, and orchestration frameworks. - Experiment with multi-modal AI (vision, text, speech) for applicability in client scenarios. - Work closely with cross-functional teams to translate business goals into intelligent, automated features.

Primary Skills:

  • Python backend expert: FastAPI, async I/O, API design, testing.
  • Production LLM integration: OpenAI/Anthropic/Gemini/Mistral; prompt and context strategies; RAG with a vector DB.
  • Cloud-native delivery: Docker, AWS (preferred), CI/CD, IaC basics (Terraform or Pulumi).
  • Data layer: SQL (PostgreSQL), caching/queues (Redis + Celery/RQ/SQS/Kafka).
  • Daily AI-assisted development (Copilot/Others) for coding and tests.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

  • Expert in Python backend development with hands-on experience integrating AI models, building cloud-native microservices, and using AI-assisted coding tools for faster, smarter development.
  • Proven hands-on experience integrating LLM APIs (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Llama, etc.).
  • Strong expertise in AI/ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, Hugging Face, etc.) as essential qualification.
  • Practical knowledge of LangChain, LlamaIndex, Codium or similar frameworks for AI workflow orchestration.
  • Understanding of prompt engineering, embeddings, vector databases (Pinecone, Weaviate, FAISS, pgvector), and RAG pipelines.
  • Strong background in cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure), containerization, and orchestration.
  • Deep understanding of REST/GraphQL APIs, async programming, task queues, and caching mechanisms.
  • Familiarity with SQL/NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis).
  • Experience using AI-assisted tools such as GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT API, AutoGen, or OpenDevin for coding and testing automation.
  • Exposure to CI/CD pipelines and Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Pulumi).
  • Knowledge of data preprocessing, NLP/NLU, and model evaluation techniques.
  • Data Engineering & Processing, Data pipeline development , ETL/ELT processes, Batch processing and stream processing frameworks, Large-scale data handling with pandas, NumPy, Dask.

Preferred Skills:

  • Hands-on with multi-modal AI (vision, text-to-speech, speech-to-text).
  • Experience with MLOps practices including CI/CD for AI pipelines, model monitoring, and drift detection.
  • Background in fine-tuning, reinforcement learning, or custom model training.
  • Familiarity with enterprise security standards (GDPR, HIPAA, SOC2).
  • Contributions to open-source or personal AI-assisted coding initiatives.

Soft Skills:

  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical thinking ability.
  • Strong cross-functional collaboration and communication skills.
  • Clear technical documentation habits.
  • Curious, experimental mindset with a drive to explore the next frontier in AI-driven development.

Preferred Skills (from tags):

Python, AI, FastAPI, Docker, SQL

LTS is seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Junior Business Analyst (Fresher) to join our growing team in Trivandrum. This role offers an exciting opportunity for individuals passionate about analyzing business processes, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and delivering technology-driven solutions. The successful candidate will assist in requirement gathering, documentation, and stakeholder communication, alongside supporting customer success activities. This position provides hands-on exposure to real-world projects, fostering a strong foundation in business analysis and enterprise software implementation.

Department: Product / Projects Employment Type: Full-time

Key Learning Opportunities

  • Exposure to real-world business analysis in enterprise SaaS projects.
  • Hands-on experience with requirement management and testing processes.
  • Practical understanding of Agile methodologies and client communication.
  • Opportunity to grow into Senior Business Analyst, Product Owner, or Project Manager roles.

Key Responsibilities

1. Business Requirement Analysis - Gather, analyze, and document business requirements in collaboration with Project Managers and clients. - Assist in preparing Business Requirement Documents (BRD), Functional Specification Documents (FSD), and User Stories. - Translate business needs into clear, actionable requirements for technical teams. - Participate in requirement workshops, sprint planning, and review meetings. - Support gap analysis between business processes and system capabilities. - Assist in identifying, analyzing, and documenting change requests and their impacts.

2. Process Modelling & Documentation - Map and document as-is and to-be processes using flowcharts, workflow diagrams, or tools like Visio, Lucidchart, or Draw.io. - Support process improvement initiatives and identify optimization opportunities. - Maintain traceability matrices for requirement coverage through design and testing.

3. Project Coordination & Testing - Collaborate with cross-functional teams including developers, QA testers, and business stakeholders. - Assist in preparing User Acceptance Testing (UAT) scenarios, test cases, and documentation. - Coordinate UAT sessions, gather feedback, and document results. - Ensure project deliverables meet business expectations and quality standards.

4. Customer & Stakeholder Communication - Act as a bridge between customers and internal teams, ensuring smooth communication. - Respond to client queries and support issues via email, chat, or support systems. - Maintain and update customer documentation, FAQs, and training materials. - Track, escalate, and follow up on customer requests until resolution. - Assist in creating training documents and user manuals for end-users.

5. Research & Continuous Improvement - Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify industry trends and product enhancement opportunities. - Stay updated on business analysis methodologies, tools, and frameworks (Agile, Scrum, Lean, etc.). - Contribute to the continuous improvement of internal processes and templates.

Preferred Skills

Junior DevOps Engineer

Company: REIZEND (P) Ltd Location: SBC Module 15, 2nd Floor, Thejaswini Building, Technopark phase 1, Trivandrum, 695581 Website: http://www.reizendretail.in Contact Email: careers@reizend.ai Job Published: October 15, 2025 Closing Date: November 29, 2025

Preferred Candidate Locations: Kerala, Tamil Nadu, and Karnataka Work Arrangement: Work From Office Office Location: Trivandrum

Brief Description

We are looking for a proactive and highly skilled Junior DevOps Engineer to provide exceptional technical support to overseas projects, working in rotational shifts to ensure 24/7 availability. This role involves troubleshooting complex issues across cloud platforms, networking, application architectures, and DevOps toolchains. The ideal candidate should be self-motivated, a collaborator, agile, and a continuous learner.

Key Responsibilities

  • Provide technical support and troubleshoot issues related to cloud platforms and services such as Fargate, ECS, DynamoDB, BigQuery, SNS, etc.
  • Understand problems by consuming logs and metrics from various sources using services such as CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Alert Managers, and Splunk, etc.
  • Analyze and resolve networking challenges, including load balancers, API gateways, reverse proxies, ingress controllers, and service-to-service communications.
  • Work on issues related to client-server communications, firewalls, and virtual machines.
  • Collaborate with DevOps teams to manage and troubleshoot toolchains like Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ingress Controllers, etc.
  • Act as the first point of contact for technical queries and escalate issues when necessary.
  • Liaise with development and operations teams to identify root causes and resolve incidents effectively.
  • Document troubleshooting steps, solutions, and maintain a knowledge base for recurring issues.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement best practices for monitoring and incident response.
  • Participate in shift handovers and provide timely updates on ongoing issues.

Preferred Skills

Cloud Platforms and Services - Hands-on knowledge working with Fargate and ECS for managing and troubleshooting containerized workloads. - Proficiency with DynamoDB and BigQuery for analyzing data and taking decisions based on the analysis. - Hands-on knowledge of SNS for debugging message delivery issues and integration workflows.

Monitoring and Logging Tools - Proficiency in CloudWatch Logs, Loki, and Splunk for consuming and analyzing logs to identify and resolve issues. - Hands-on knowledge with Prometheus and Grafana for analyzing metrics using dashboards and monitoring system health. - Knowledge of Alert Manager for configuring and managing alert escalation. - Ability to interpret metrics from various sources and create actionable insights.

Networking and Security - Understanding of load balancers (e.g., ALB, NLB) for distributing traffic and troubleshooting connectivity issues. - Knowledge in API Gateways like AWS API Gateway or NGINX for managing API traffic. - Knowledge of reverse proxies and ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX Ingress, Traefik) for managing internal/external traffic. - Understanding service-to-service communications, including DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, and gRPC protocols. - Hands-on knowledge with firewalls, security groups, and IAM roles for secure communications. - Troubleshooting skills for VM-related issues in platforms like AWS EC2 or equivalent.

DevOps Toolchains - Proficiency with Docker for managing container images and runtime debugging. - Understanding of Kubernetes concepts of managing deployments, ingress setups, and pod-related issues and related troubleshooting commands and mechanisms. - Knowledge of CI/CD pipeline building tools such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, ArgoCD for building, deploying, and managing automated pipelines. - Understanding of Ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX, Traefik) and SSL termination for secure routing.

Troubleshooting and Incident Management - Strong problem-solving skills to identify root causes using logs, metrics, and system-level debugging. - Ability to document detailed troubleshooting steps and solutions for recurring issues.

Collaboration and Communication - Ability to work with cross-functional teams (DevOps, development, and operations) to resolve incidents. - Skills in effective and proactive communication to escalate issues and provide updates during shift handovers. - Proficiency with tools like Slack, JIRA, Confluence, or Google Workspace for collaboration and issue tracking.

Experience: 0.5 - 2 years Salary Package: 4 - 6 LPA
summary: Junior DevOps Engineer needed for overseas project support. Responsibilities include troubleshooting cloud, networking, and DevOps issues. Requires 0.5-2 years of experience.

We are looking for a Lead Full Stack Developer passionate about balancing innovation with practical client solutions. The ideal candidate is eager to learn, grow, and committed to delivering exceptional results.

Job Description:

  • Full-Stack Development: Lead the design, development, and maintenance of front-end and back-end web applications using Angular or React, and Node.js.
  • Architect Solutions: Design and implement scalable, maintainable, and secure application architectures following best practices and industry standards.
  • Cloud Integration: Build, deploy, and manage applications on AWS or Azure, utilizing services like Lambda, EC2, S3, RDS, API Gateway for scalability and high availability.
  • API Development: Develop and integrate RESTful APIs and GraphQL services to support front-end applications and other backend services.
  • Mentorship and Leadership: Mentor junior and mid-level developers, providing technical guidance to ensure high-quality code and development best practices.
  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with UX/UI designers, product managers, and QA teams to deliver outstanding user experiences and meet project deadlines.
  • Performance Optimization: Continuously monitor and optimize application performance on both client-side and server-side for a seamless user experience.
  • Continuous Improvement: Contribute to the evolution of development processes, methodologies, and tooling, driving the adoption of new technologies and practices.
  • Code Reviews & Best Practices: Lead code reviews, enforce coding standards, and maintain high test coverage (unit, integration, E2E).

Required Skills & Experience:

  • 8+ years of experience in full-stack development.
  • Strong proficiency in Angular or React, Node.js, and JavaScript/TypeScript.
  • In-depth experience with cloud platforms (AWS or Azure) and services (EC2, Lambda, S3, RDS).
  • Strong experience in backend development with Node.js, including building and integrating REST APIs, middleware, and microservices.
  • Extensive experience with front-end frameworks (Angular or React), including component-driven architecture, state management (NgRx, Redux), and UI performance optimization.
  • Experience with SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB, DynamoDB) databases, including design, optimization, and migrations.
  • Expertise in version control systems (Git) and workflows.
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform.
  • Strong understanding of software design patterns, microservices architecture, and agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban).
  • Ability to write clean, maintainable, efficient code with a focus on TDD and continuous integration.
  • Experience with front-end optimization techniques (bundling, lazy loading, code splitting, caching).

Preferred Skills:

  • Familiarity with serverless architectures (AWS Lambda, Azure Functions).
  • Knowledge of DevOps practices and infrastructure-as-code tools (Terraform, CloudFormation).
  • Familiarity with GraphQL.
  • Experience with message brokers (RabbitMQ, Kafka).
  • Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies and leading cross-functional teams.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule with weekends off.

  • Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance.

  • Work-life balance with flexible work timings, early out Fridays, social and cultural activities.
  • Company-sponsored international tours.
